title: The Ordination of Aaron and His Sons
summary: Leviticus 8 describes the ordination of Aaron and his sons as priests. Moses washes, clothes, and anoints them, offering sacrifices to consecrate them for service to God over a seven-day period.

faq.question: Who conducted the ordination?
faq.answer: Moses carried out the ordination as instructed by God.

faq.question: How long did the ordination last?
